title: Ranked Champion Select
body: In Champion select and i was first pick, I was clicking to ban zed, But it would not let me ban him or ban anyone else. I was also in my last game for promos and i could not ban or pick a champion so i had to leave the game, so i lost my promos. Could anyone tell or help me to why this happened. Anyway Thanks RITO

replies.body: It's a server side issue, most likely. What ISP are you with?
How do I find out my ISP? :)

You shouldn't be using your internet if you don't know who your ISP is. In order to use your internet you must agree to your ISP's Terms and Conditions, which involves acknowledging you know who they are and what they stand for. If you're using it without knowing this, then you are breaking those conditions and can be sued.

Not that any ISP would be bothered to hire the private investigators to actually do that, though.

To find out what ISP you're using, check your memory for when you brought your internet connection. You would of had to have faced them at some point. If you are using someone else's connection (such as your guardians') then ask them.
